title: MBMBaM 576: Several Iguanadons
description:
It turns out that Travis has a weird secret superpower that works perfectly for helping people and pleases the Wizard. Now if we can just figure out how to monetize it. 

Suggested talking points: I Miss Breathing on People, Congratulations on Your Attitude, The Time Well, Slambourgini, I’m a Ketchup Eater

Support AAPI communities and those affected by anti-Asian violence: https://www.gofundme.com/c/act/stop-aapi-hate 

For resources on anti-racism and fighting police violence: https://blacklivesmatters.carrd.co/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
